attributes.action: New Legislation to force Petrol Stations to reduce Fuel Prices when Oil Prices fall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it when oil prices rise petrol prices are quick to go up in price but when they fall the prices stay the same.
Time for the government to start doing something to ease the pressures on the British people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
